name: EHEYCIGA Curved Dog Stairs Ramp for Small Dogs 15.7" H, 3-Step Dog Steps for Couch Sofa and Chair, Pet Stairs for Cats, Non-Slip Balanced Pet Steps Indoor, Grey
short_description: COMFORTABLE PET STAIRS - This foam dog stair is designed directly against the edge of a bed, sofa or other furniture, so your pet can climb up and down comfortably.

SPECIFIC AND STEADY DESIGN - 33D density of pure foam make this stair more steady when your pets walk on. The dog bed stairs can provide strong support for pets in the walking process. Low angle slope design can better protect your pet's joints.

MULTIPLE STEP SIZES - This dog stair has 2 steps, 3 steps, 4 steps and 5 steps to choose. Our 2-step stairs fits for chair/sofa/bed up to 13inch. 3-step stairs fits for chair/sofa/bed up to 17inch. 4-step stairs fits for chair/sofa/bed up to 21inch. And 5-step stairs fits for chair/sofa/bed up to 24inch.

EASY TO CLEAN - The dog step has a removable washable cover made of bonded fleece that can be hand washed or machine washed, so you don't require spending a lot of time cleaning it. It's very convenient.

CARE INSTRUCTION - After removing the foam from the compression bag, please allow 24-48 hours for the foam to fully expand before use. No need to set the cover. Please note that the inner foam is not washable.

name: Made4Pets Dog Stairs Ramp for Bed 19.7" H, 4-Step Dog Steps for High Bed Couch Sofa Climbing, 35D Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Non-Slip Bottom Pet Stairs, Grey
short_description: Comfortable & Joint-Friendly Ramp Design - These foam pet stairs feature a gentle slope that reduces strain on your pet's joints, making it perfect for dogs with limited mobility, joint issues, or older pets. The soft, steady foam offers maximum comfort as your pet climbs with ease.

Multiple Step Sizes to Fit Your Needs - Available in 3, 4, and 5-step versions, these dog stairs are designed to fit beds, couches, sofas, and chairs ranging from 17 to 24 inches in height. Choose the right size for your furniture and your pet's needs, whether it's for small medium large dogs or pets with joint issues.

Stable & Non-Slip for Safe Use – Built with high-density 35D foam, these ramp pet stairs provide firm support and stability. The soft coral fleece surface offers gentle traction for your pet’s paws, while the non-slip bottom keeps the stairs steady on floors, ensuring safe and confident climbing every time.

Easy to Clean & Maintain: The removable fleece cover is machine washable for easy cleaning—just remove the foam core and toss the cover in the wash. Note: After unpacking, allow the foam to fully expand to ensure maximum comfort and stability. For long-lasting use, wipe the foam core clean. This simple care keeps your pet's stairs fresh and comfy for your furry friend!

Durable, Pet-Safe Materials - Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foam, these pet steps are built with your pet's safety in mind. The high-density foam offers lasting support, while the non-toxic materials ensure a healthy environment for your furry companion.
